definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Put the Bunsen burner on a heat-proof mat3.
sentences.chinese: 把本生燈放在防熱的墊子上。

sentences.english: First , I take a beaker of water and heat it gently over a bunsen burner .
sentences.chinese: 首先，取一燒杯的水，在本生燈上微微加熱。

sentences.english: "It's just a phase you're going through", replied the Bunsen burner.
sentences.chinese: “這只是物理中狀態變化的一個階段”本生燈答到。
